# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an announcement notification with an attributed string value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ announcement: NSAttributedString)
```

## Creating an announcement notification

- **init(_:)**: Creates an announcement notification with a string.
- **init(_:)**: Creates an announcement notification with an attributed string object.
